entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 3:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

Humidity: 92 %

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
